job_history.work_description: Responsible for all aspects of accounts payable, receivable and payroll. Banking liaison: reconciled statements, credit card and additional reconciliations. Month end analysis, closing and production of month and year end financial reporting. Preparation of monthly commission reports. Control and monitoring of complex, high volume Production Petty Cash and daily Cash Report. Preparation of 1099-s.

Supervised, trained and managed a staff of four permanent employees, plus interns. Oversaw the general accounting department areas: accounts payable, receivable and payroll. Banking liaison: reconciled statements, credit card, lockbox and additional reconciliations. Month end analysis, closing and production of month and year end financial reporting. Preparation of monthly commission reports. Control and monitoring of complex, high volume Production Petty Cash process.

Responsible for all aspects of accounts payable and accounts receivable functions. Reorganizing and reconciling online based business transactions. Bank, credit card and other reconciliations. Month end analysis and closing. Managed and trained college interns. Preparation of royalty reports. Preparation of 1099-s.

skills.name: General Accounting
skills.explanation: Over 15 years of experience in all aspects of accounting, including accounts payable, receivable, and payroll, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in reconciliations, including bank statements, credit card, and lockbox, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Handled payroll functions consistently for over 15 years, suggesting expert-level mastery in payroll management.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Supervised, trained, and managed a staff of four permanent employees, plus interns, indicating strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Produced month and year end financial reports for over 15 years, showing expert-level mastery in financial reporting.

skills.name: Cash Management
skills.explanation: Controlled and monitored complex, high volume Production Petty Cash process, suggesting strong proficiency in cash management.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Although not explicitly mentioned, experience in financial reporting and analysis suggests a solid working proficiency in budgeting.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Likely used extensively for managing financial records and payroll, suggesting strong proficiency.
